Package com.qoretechnologies.qorus.workflow

Class StepDataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qore.jni.QoreObjectWrapper
      • com.qoretechnologies.qorus.workflow.WorkflowDataHelper
        • com.qoretechnologies.qorus.workflow.StepDataHelper
  • public class StepDataHelper
extends WorkflowDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::StepDataHelper "StepDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows stepdata "workflow dynamic step data" to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor Calls to the following workflow API functions related to stepdata "workflow dynamic data" can be made normally while this object exists and the write lock is held; the functions are aware of and automatically use the write lock held by this object:
    • QorusStepBase.deleteStepDataKey()
    • QorusStepBase.getStepData()
    • QorusStepBase.updateStepData()
    The %Qore-language destructor is run at the end of the Java step execution, after the step returns to Qorus.

      • Fields inherited from class org.qore.jni.QoreObjectWrapper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void deleteKey​(java.lang.String... keys)
      Deletes one or more keys from stepdata "dynamic step data"; the changes have already been committed to the database when the method returns This method is equivalent to QorusStepBase.deleteStepDataKey()
      void replace()
      Clears stepdata "dynamic step data"; the change has already been committed to the database when the method returns
      void replace​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> new_data)
      Replaces stepdata "dynamic step data"; the data has already been committed to the database when the method returns
      void update​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> new_data)
      Adds data to stepdata "dynamic step data"; the data has already been committed to the database when the method returns This method is equivalent to QorusStepBase.updateStepData()

    • Method Detail

      • replace

        public void replace​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> new_data)
             throws java.lang.Throwable
        Replaces stepdata "dynamic step data"; the data has already been committed to the database when the method returns
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
        Note:
        • there is currently no function equivalent to this method for stepdata "workflow dynamic step data"; this method replaces all the data with new_data
        • the use of this method causes SQL I/O to be performed in the system schema; to maximize performance, calls to this and other similar methods should be minimized if possible

      • replace

        public void replace()
             throws java.lang.Throwable
        Clears stepdata "dynamic step data"; the change has already been committed to the database when the method returns
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
        Note:
        • there is currently no function equivalent to this method for stepdata "workflow dynamic step data"; this method clears all the data
        • the use of this method causes SQL I/O to be performed in the system schema; to maximize performance, calls to this and other similar methods should be minimized if possible
